attributes.additional_details: As a father I am quite happy to pay for my children but I feel it is unfair that the CSA do not take into consideration your Rent/Mortgage and Council Tax payments I pay £400 every month which leaves me with little to live on and struggle to get all my bills paid as I am not left with much after the CSA take their money I am looking for every man to agree with me and as many signatures as I can to march this to Parliament
